row.question: A man earns RS. 20 on the first day and spends Rs. 15 on the next day. He again earns Rs. 20 on the third day and spends Rs. 15 on the fourth day. If he continues to save like this, how soon will he have Rs. 60 in hand?
row.rationale:
For every 2 days, he saves rs.5.
After 16 days, the savings become rs.40.
on the 17th day, he earns rs.20
so 40+20=rs.60.
ANSWER:A
